title: Bank of England Is Set to Raise Rates After U.K. Political Turmoil
description: An increase of three-quarters of a point is expected as the central bank meets on Thursday for the first time since Liz Truss resigned as prime minister.
dc:creator: Eshe Nelson
media:credit: Sam Bush for The New York Times
media:description: The Bank of England, like many of the worldâ€™s central banks, has been raising interest rates in the face of the highest inflation in decades.
